duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Quality Control department with daily, weekly, and monthly tasks.
Prepare labware for autoclaving and conduct sterility testing.
Perform residue checking of washed labware and clean and maintain lab equipment.
Take inventory and order supplies, and conduct daily, weekly, and monthly maintenance of laboratory equipment.
Set up QC organisms and perform environmental monitoring and water testing.
Conduct clerical work involving filing and data entry review, and perform testing on prepared and purchased media.
Document receipt and routing of testing samples from various production departments and conduct special projects as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors/Associate Degree in related field required.
